title: DevOps & Reliability
description: CI/CD, AWS cloud foundations, observability, security hardening, and cost/performance optimization.

hero.headline: Ship Faster, Sleep Better
hero.subheadline: Production-grade DevOps: CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, monitoring, and security that scales with your team.

benefits.title: Automated CI/CD Pipelines
benefits.description: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, or CircleCI workflows that test, build, and deploy code with every commit.

benefits.title: Infrastructure as Code
benefits.description: Terraform/CloudFormation templates for reproducible, version-controlled cloud environments.

benefits.title: Container Orchestration
benefits.description: Docker + Kubernetes deployments with auto-scaling, health checks, and rolling updates.

benefits.title: Observability & Alerting
benefits.description: Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK stack for metrics, logs, and distributed tracing.

benefits.title: Security Hardening
benefits.description: Least-privilege IAM, secrets management, network segmentation, and vulnerability scanning.

benefits.title: Cost Optimization
benefits.description: Right-sizing instances, reserved capacity, and auto-scaling policies to reduce cloud spend.

process.title: Infrastructure Audit
process.description: Assess current setup, identify bottlenecks, security gaps, and cost inefficiencies.

process.title: Architecture & Planning
process.description: Design cloud architecture, choose managed services, and define IaC structure.

process.title: Implementation & Migration
process.description: Build pipelines, provision infrastructure, and migrate workloads with zero downtime.

process.title: Monitoring & Iteration
process.description: Set up dashboards, alerts, and runbooks for continuous improvement and incident response.
